question: 位置
sourceMnemonic: Go ahead and <kanji>put</kanji> a <kanji>rank</kanji> on something. This one is rank #1, so its <vocabulary>position</vocabulary> is up higher. Then you put a rank #67 on something. That one's position is lower.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
